document.discussion_title: Broncos’ Running Back CJ Anderson to host: THE SMILE GENERATION ORANGE & BLUE SUPER BOWLING CELEBRATION PARTY
document.topic_text:
By: PRBuzz 28 AM EDT Broncos’ Running Back CJ Anderson to host: THE SMILE GENERATION ORANGE & BLUE SUPER BOWLING CELEBRATION PARTY “Proceeds to benefit local students in Denver community” DENVER, CO - Broncos’ CJ Anderson has a knack for running the ball with precision and power, the same can be said for his bowling skills. Anderson who is known to be one the best bowlers in the NFL will host The Smile Generation Orange & Blue Super Bowling Celebration Party. Professional Bowlers Association star Sean Rash, who is a self-proclaimed die-hard Broncos’ fan, will join Anderson in a meet and greet with fans, sign autographs and face-off in a Battle of the Pro-Bowlers challenge. Strikes For Kids will be putting on the charity fundraiser taking place at Brunswick Zone XL in Lone Tree on Monday, May 16th from 5:30 pm to 8:00 pm. Proceeds from the event will go to benefiting The Strikes For Kids Scholarship Program. The program will award two (2) local students with scholarships in the amount of $750 each to assist them with paying for books and essentials for their first year of college. The admission for the event is $20 per spectator, $35 per bowler or $200 for a team of (6) six bowlers. Admission for bowlers includes 90 minutes of bowling, pizza, soda, goody bags, game cards, shoe rental and silent auction. Event tickets and sponsorship opportunities are available through the web site, www.orangeandbluebowlingbash.com or by contacting Joe Allen (559) 241-4412. Strikes For Kids is a 501 c(3) non-profit organization created to give fans, families and local businesses an opportunity to meet their favorite athletes while supporting great causes in the community. The organization partners more than a hundred professional athletes in order to benefit youth organizations and enriching the lives of students around the United States. Strikes For Kids coordinates bowling, golf and softball events that allows fans, families and local businesses an opportunity to meet their favorite athletes while support great causes in the community.
